messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Mark Ryals, the previous warden has been demoted to station HealSlut, make sure you make him feel welcome and remember HE LIKES IT ROUGH

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We are going to be having Corgi puppies! How adorable.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Our sensors have detected life signs breeding within your maintenance, please check it out and exterminate if necessary.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The life signs we detected have appeared to settled some kind of hive or nest north of the chapel, please investigate and exterminate as necessary.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The life signs we detected are dying rapidly, great work crew. Glad the deadly threat has been eliminated so quickly. Such competence is rare from you all.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Strange, there seems to be another smaller nest remaining nearby.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Congratulations to staff member Jetra Norlan for their great work killing unidentified life signs, would you mind reporting into the communications console about what the threat was?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: AI Satellite Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We take back our congratulations to Jetra Norlan, no cute fluffy animals are allowed to die on the station. Protect them like you would protect the captain.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We have supply dropped a small care package of lazarus injectors into cargo storage. Please use these to help protect the cute fluffy animals.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: All qualifying pets excluding poly and the sloth are to be stored at the bridge.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Reminder that 10 lazarus injectors are on standby to rescue pets in the cargo bay's storage

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: More life signs have appeared in the captain's office, they better be cute fluffy pets.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Call shuttle yay or nay

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Genetics Lab.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Higher Dimensional Affairs

An acausal dimensional event has been detected in your sector. Event has been flagged EXTINCTION-CLASS. Directing all available assets toward simulating solutions. SOLUTION ETA: 60 SECONDS.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Higher Dimensional Affairs

Simulations on acausal dimensional event complete. Deploying solution package now. Deployment ETA: ONE MINUTE.
